original_task: go to desktop and run commands such that first it create s anew pdf folder and v run more commands to move all  the pdf filse present in the desktop  into that folder

steps.success_criteria: Successfully listed contents of the desktop directory
steps.error_handling: If directory does not exist or cannot be accessed, handle the error and stop the process
steps.result: The step has been completed successfully.

steps.description: Create a new folder named 'pdf' on the desktop
steps.success_criteria: Successfully created a new 'pdf' folder on the desktop
steps.error_handling: If unable to create the folder, handle the error and stop the process

steps.description: Search for all PDF files on the desktop
steps.success_criteria: Successfully found all PDF files on the desktop
steps.error_handling: If no PDF files are found, handle the error gracefully and end the process

steps.description: Move all PDF files to the 'pdf' folder
steps.success_criteria: All PDF files moved to the 'pdf' folder successfully
steps.error_handling: If unable to move files, handle the error and clean up any partial moves

overall_strategy: First, check the desktop directory for existing PDF files. Then, create a new 'pdf' folder. Next, search for PDF files and finally move them into the 'pdf' folder.
risk_assessment: Potential risks include lack of permissions to access desktop or move files, non-existence of PDF files on the desktop, or errors in creating the 'pdf' folder. Mitigation strategies include proper error handling and cleanup actions.
